trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter that can retrieve a list of data sources accessible to the current component.
trans-unit.target: 提供类型转换器，可检索当前组件所能访问的数据源的列表。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter> provides methods that can be used to retrieve a list of data sources accessible to the current design-time component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter> 提供用于检索当前的设计时组件所能访问的数据源的列表的方法。

trans-unit.source: This type converter is used by [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] to provide the values that appear in the list of data sources in the **Properties** window.
trans-unit.target: 使用此类型转换器[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]提供显示在列表中的数据源中的值**属性**窗口。

trans-unit.source: You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 相反，通过调用适当的转换器<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基类。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: 可用于获取附加上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the type you want to convert from.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示要转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the converter can convert an object of the specified source type to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示转换器是否可以将指定源类型的对象转换为转换器的本机类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果转换器能执行转换，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, this method always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在此类中实现时，此方法始终返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to provide your own conversion requirements.
trans-unit.target: 重写该方法以提供您自己的转换需求。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="context" /> can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" />可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: This may be <see langword="null" />, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 这可能为 <see langword="null" />，因此应总是对其进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may also return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象上的属性也可能返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: 可用于获取附加上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that can be used to support localization features.
trans-unit.target: 可用于支持本地化功能的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: 将指定对象转换为转换器的本机类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the specified object after conversion.
trans-unit.target: 表示转换后的指定对象的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The conversion could not be performed.
trans-unit.target: 转换未能执行。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to meet your own conversion requirements.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法，以满足您自己的转换需求。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="context" /> parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment the converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" />参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: It might be <see langword="null" />, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 它可能是<see langword="null" />，因此应始终对其进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties of the context object may also return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象的属性也可能返回<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> indicating the component or control to get values for.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />，它指示要获取其值的组件或控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the standard data sources accessible to the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件可以访问的标准数据源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> listing the standard accessible data sources.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" />，它列出标准的可访问数据源。

trans-unit.source: The data sources that are accessible to the component are determined by retrieving a list of components from the designer, testing each component with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method, and then returning the components that are valid data sources.
trans-unit.target: 由组件所能访问的数据源检索的组件的列表，从设计器中，测试与每个组件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A>方法，并返回有效的数据源的组件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: 可用于获取附加上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection of standard values returned from <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues" /> is a list of all possible values.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示从 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues" /> 返回的标准值集合是否为所有可能值的列表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> returned from <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues" /> is an exclusive list of all possible values; <see langword="false" /> if other values are possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果从 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> 返回的 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues" /> 是所有可能值的独占列表，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果还可能有其他值，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in this class, this method always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在此类中实现时，此方法始终返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果该列表是独占的（如在枚举数据类型中），则其他任何值都无效。

trans-unit.source: If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> provides.
trans-unit.target: 如果该列表不是独占的则没有其他有效的值的标准列表值之外<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>提供。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if the type you want to convert supports standard values.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要转换的类型支持标准值，重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="context" /> parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: It might be <see langword="null" />, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: 它可能是<see langword="null" />，因此应始终对其进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties of the context object may also return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 同样，上下文对象的属性也可能返回<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: 可用于获取附加上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the converter supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示转换器是否支持可从列表中选取的一组标准值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues" /> should be called to find a common set of values the object supports; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应调用 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetStandardValues" /> 来查找对象支持的一组公共值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 此实现总是返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The component to check as a valid data source.
trans-unit.target: 要检查是否为有效数据源的组件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified component is a valid data source for this converter.
trans-unit.target: 指示指定组件是否为此转换器的有效数据源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="component" /> implements <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> or <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="component" /> 实现了 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A> method to determine the components that are available as standard accessible data sources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter.IsValidDataSource%2A>方法来确定可用作标准的可访问数据源的组件。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter> class, a valid data source is a component that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter>类，有效的数据源是一个组件，实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>接口。

trans-unit.source: Custom data source converters can derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter" /> class, and override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter.IsValidDataSource(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" /> method, to test for the interface implementations that are required to use a component as a data source.
trans-unit.target: 自定义数据源转换器可以派生自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter" />类，并重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceConverter.IsValidDataSource(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)" />方法，以测试所需使用作为数据源的组件的接口实现。
